item.title: Why write documentation
item.description: Why write technical documentation? The best documentation is no documentation: code should be self-explanatory. All the lazy developers in history Writing documentation is hard. We try to find excuses and rationalize and lie to ourselves so we can feel better about the fact that we should be doing it, but it’s “too much work”. Here are two good reasons to try and convince you to start writing documentation, and help you while you help others, too:
